snippet.title: Layers of Fear - Official Cinematic Story Trailer | Future Games Show 2023
snippet.description:
Watch the latest chilling cinematic trailer for Layers of Fear to learn more about the story of The Writer, and get a peek at the unsettling and creepy lighthouse location of this upcoming psychological horror game. Layers of Fear will be available on PC, Apple Silicon Mac, PlayStation 5, and Xbox Series X/S on June 15, 2023.

#IGN #SummerOfGaming
